name: expedia_scrape_reviews
description: Scrape reviews from an Expedia hotel page. Returns guest reviews with rating, title, content, date, traveler type, and positive/negative highlights.

steps.code: const reviews = []; const reviewEls = document.querySelectorAll('[data-stid*="review"], [class*="review-card"], [class*="ReviewCard"], [itemprop="review"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(reviewEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = reviewEls[i]; const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, [class*="score"]'); const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, h4, [class*="review-title"], [class*="title"]'); const contentEl = el.querySelector('[class*="review-text"], [class*="review-body"], p'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, [class*="date"], [class*="timestamp"]'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('[class*="author"], [class*="reviewer"]'); const travelerTypeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="traveler"], [class*="trip-type"]'); const positiveEl = el.querySelector('[class*="positive"], [class*="liked"]'); const negativeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="negative"], [class*="disliked"]'); reviews.push({ rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', content: contentEl ? contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', traveler_type: travelerTypeEl ? travelerTypeEl.textContent.trim() : '', positive: positiveEl ? positiveEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '', negative: negativeEl ? negativeEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '' }); } const overallEl = document.querySelector('[class*="overall-rating"], [class*="guest-rating"] span'); const totalEl = document.querySelector('[class*="review-count"], [class*="total-reviews"]'); return { overall_rating: overallEl ? overallEl.textContent.trim() : '', total_reviews: totalEl ? totalEl.textContent.trim() : '', scraped_count: reviews.length, reviews: reviews, url: window.location.href }
